verses.verse: <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for he has <S%H2963>torn,<s%> and he will <S%H7495>heal<s%> us; he has <S%H5221>smitten,<s%> and he will <S%H2280>bind<s%> us up.
After two <S%H3117>days<s%> will he <S%H2421>revive<s%> us: in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he will <S%H6965>raise<s%> us up, and we shall <S%H2421>live<s%> in his <S%H6440>sight.<s%>

Then shall we <S%H3045>know,<s%> if we <S%H7291>follow<s%> on to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> his <S%H4161>going<s%> <S%H4161>forth<s%> is <S%H3559>prepared<s%> as the <S%H7837>morning;<s%> and he shall <S%H935>come<s%> to us as the <S%H1653>rain,<s%> as the <S%H4456>latter<s%> and <S%H3138>former<s%> <S%H3384>rain<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

O <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> to you? O <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> to you? for your <S%H2617>goodness<s%> is as a <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and as the <S%H7925>early<s%> <S%H2919>dew<s%> it <S%H1980>goes<s%> away.

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I <S%H2672>hewed<s%> them by the <S%H5030>prophets;<s%> I have <S%H2026>slain<s%> them by the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> and your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are as the <S%H216>light<s%> that <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth.<s%>
For I <S%H2654>desired<s%> <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> and not <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> and the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> more than <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings.
But they like <S%H120>men<s%> have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> have they dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against me.
<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> is a <S%H7151>city<s%> of them that <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and is <S%H6121>polluted<s%> with <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And as <S%H1416>troops<s%> of robbers <S%H2442>wait<s%> for a <S%H376>man,<s%> so the <S%H2267>company<s%> of <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7523>murder<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H7926>consent:<s%> for they <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H2154>lewdness.<s%>

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> an <S%H8186>horrible<s%> thing in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> is the <S%H2184>prostitution<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>
<S%H1571>Also,<s%> O <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> he has <S%H7896>set<s%> an <S%H7105>harvest<s%> for you, when I <S%H7725>returned<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of my <S%H5971>people.<s%>
